var dataset = ee.Image('UMD/hansen/global_forest_change_2021_v1_9');

var treeCoverVisParam = {
  bands: ['treecover2000'],
  min: 0,
  max: 100,
  palette: ['black', 'green']
};

Map.addLayer(dataset, treeCoverVisParam, 'tree cover');

var treeLossVisParam = {
  bands: ['lossyear'],
  min: 14,
  max: 21,
  palette: ['yellow', 'red']
};

Map.addLayer(dataset, treeLossVisParam, 'tree loss year');

var geometry = ee.Geometry.Polygon([
  [
    [-57.75132524054595, -25.53050552255056],
   [-58.12486039679595, -26.04489861199293],
   [-58.71812211554595, -27.418548138282002],
   [-57.92710649054595, -27.360019482682407],
   [-56.87241899054595, -27.632887654302213],
   [-56.03745805304595, -27.710725538295012],
   [-55.29038774054595, -27.125595763005872],
   [-54.63120805304595, -26.576697302656793],
   [-54.43345414679595, -25.7286129325785],
   [-54.36753617804595, -25.113415470802455],
   [-54.21372758429595, -23.934005833481145],
   [-54.56529008429595, -23.67265962818087],
   [-55.20249711554595, -23.89383298535928],
   [-55.51011430304595, -22.95632901626739],
   [-55.68589555304595, -22.185329110138],
   [-56.45493852179595, -22.002096394921075],
   [-57.70737992804595, -22.042835320001476],
   [-57.79527055304595, -20.733469240831674],
   [-58.21275102179595, -19.702546974058638],
   [-59.06968461554595, -19.226059919660187],
   [-60.12437211554595, -19.184560345672903],
   [-61.79429399054595, -19.536971354733776],
   [-62.49741899054595, -20.56898295918356],
   [-62.43150102179595, -21.184882368038316],
   [-62.78306352179595, -22.388641052659313],
   [-62.32163774054595, -22.672778747235974],
   [-61.77232133429595, -23.36037050918267],
   [-61.13511430304595, -23.88378782236402],
   [-59.99253617804595, -24.244920438820667],
   [-58.78404008429595, -24.844530979004],
   [-58.035644101126294, -25.19477116576286],
   [-57.75132524054595, -25.53050552255056]
  ]
]);

Map.centerObject(geometry);

Map.addLayer(dataset.clip(geometry), treeCoverVisParam, 'tree cover in region');
Map.addLayer(dataset.clip(geometry), treeLossVisParam, 'tree loss year in region');
